response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that are sure to exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it is worth more than $12,000 to you. Considering the value it brings, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this exceptional product for yourself.", "product_price": 15000}
